themes: need for sustainability and audience development
opposition to multiple grants for single organizations
critique of reliance on HOT fund
key_phrases: no way to sustain themselves after the 2 year duration of the grant
Better to start with smaller grants
grow in ways that could endure without enormous infusions of money
no short-cuts; each group must grow its audience and its donors in a sustainable way
grants should be limited to 1 per organization
must not allow single organizations to get 4 or 5 grants in one year
barriers_identified: lack of sustainability after grant period
multiple grants awarded to single organizations
solutions_proposed: encourage audience and donor development for sustainability
